tasks.instruction: Find the best-rated late-night Korean restaurant in Champaign, IL that opens beyond 9pm on Google Maps.
rubrics: Opened Maps
Searched for Korean restaurants in Champaign, IL
Checked at least one restaurant's rating
Checked at least one restaurant's opening hours
Checked multiple restaurants' ratings and opening hours
Stopped at the screen showing a highly-rated korean restaurant in Champaign, IL that opens beyond 9pm
human_reference_operations: type 'late-night Korean restaurants in Champaign, IL'
swipe up to see more time
swipe up to check more ratings
swipe up to check more ratings and select one with high rating

tasks.instruction: Find the best-rated Thai restaurant in Urbana, IL that serves duck cuisine on Google Maps. Review customer comments and compile a summary of positive and negative feedback in 'Keep Notes'.

The summary includes both positive and negative feedback

swipe up to see more dishes
swipe up to see more dishes

swipe left on the sub-menu bar to nagivate to main courses
swipe up to see more dishes (found Heaven Duck Curry)
swipe up tp see more reviews
swipe up tp see more reviews to find negative reviews
swipe up tp see more reviews to find negative reviews
swipe up tp see more reviews to find negative reviews
tap more on a review with 4 stars (not 5 stars)
swipe up tp see more reviews to find more nagative comments
swipe up tp see more reviews to find more nagative comments
swipe up tp see more reviews to find more nagative comments (found one mentioning cold breeze)
type 'Summary of comments for Siam Terrace's...'

tasks.instruction: Find the most-cited paper that cites the paper 'Segment Anything' on Google Scholar. Stop at the screen showing the paper abstract.

Navigated to Google Scholar

Found the most-cited paper amoung the viewed citing papers

swipe up to see more citing papers
swipe up to see more citing papers
tap 'Visual instruction tuning' (which is being cited 4600+ times)

tasks.instruction: Find at least three representative survey papers on LLM agents on Google Scholar, and add their titles to the Notes in 'Keep Notes'.

tasks.instruction: I have some onions, beef, and potatoes in my refrigerator. Can you find me a Chinese-style recipe that uses all three ingredients and can be prepared in under an hour? And find me a video tutorial on YouTube for that. Stop at the screen displaying the video.
rubrics: Opened Chrome
Searched for Chinese recipes using onions, beef, and potatoes under 1 hour
Found a suitable recipe
Opened YouTube
Searched for a video tutorial for the chosen recipe
Selected a relevant tutorial video
Stopped at a screen showing the video
human_reference_operations: type 'Chinese recipe with onions beef potatoes under 1 hour'
type the name of the recipe
tap on a relevant tutorial video
